plot: TV-Special celebrating the 100th anniversary of the invention of the cinema, with the theme of stardom - what it is, how you get it, how you lose it, the power it offers, and the salaries which come with it.
title: Lights, Camera, Action! A Century of the Cinema: A Star Is Born
plot_es: TV-Special celebrating the 100th anniversary of the invention of the cinema, with the theme of stardom - what it is, how you get it, how you lose it, the power it offers, and the salaries which come with it.
original_name: Lights, Camera, Action! A Century of the Cinema: A Star Is Born
plot_en: TV-Special celebrating the 100th anniversary of the invention of the cinema, with the theme of stardom - what it is, how you get it, how you lose it, the power it offers, and the salaries which come with it.
